1.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame.

2.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame and bring it closer.

3.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame.

4.png.description: The TV is partially visible at the top of the image. Moving down will help center it vertically in the frame.

5.png.description: The TV is clearly visible and centered in the frame. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

6.png.description: The TV is clearly visible and takes up a significant portion of the image, but it still appears more than 1 meter away. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the TV.

7.png.description: The TV is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear details. No further movement is necessary.
